        "1b2dbea1d2934517a4def9713aeed514": {
          "id": "1b2dbea1d2934517a4def9713aeed514",
          "name": "Due This Week",
          "script": "(function execute() {\n\n    var list = [];\n    var gr = new GlideRecord(\"asmt_assessment_instance\");\n    gr.addEncodedQuery('stateNOT INcomplete,canceled^metric_type.evaluation_method=attestation_v2^userDYNAMIC90d1921e5f510100a9ad2572f2b477fe^due_date<javascript:gs.beginningOfNextWeek()');\n    //due_dateONNext week@javascript:gs.beginningOfNextWeek()@javascript:gs.endOfNextWeek()\n    gr.orderByDesc(\"sys_updated_on\");\n    gr.query();\n    while (gr.hasNext()) {\n        gr.next();\n        list.push(gr.getUniqueValue());\n    }\n    vaVars.attestation_list = JSON.stringify(list);\n\n})()\n",
          "stepType": "ScriptAction",
          "applicability": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "query"
          }
        },
        "1d5d95d83d3f4b1ba6128ad433c144f3": {
          "id": "1d5d95d83d3f4b1ba6128ad433c144f3",
          "name": "Due Today",
          "script": "(function execute() {\n\n    var list = [];\n    var gr = new GlideRecord(\"asmt_assessment_instance\");\n    gr.addEncodedQuery('stateNOT INcomplete,canceled^metric_type.evaluation_method=attestation_v2^userDYNAMIC90d1921e5f510100a9ad2572f2b477fe^due_date<javascript:gs.beginningOfTomorrow()');\n    gr.orderByDesc(\"sys_updated_on\");\n    gr.query();\n    while (gr.hasNext()) {\n        gr.next();\n        list.push(gr.getUniqueValue());\n    }\n    vaVars.attestation_list = JSON.stringify(list);\n\n})()\n\n",
          "stepType": "ScriptAction",
          "applicability": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "query"
          }
        },
        "d472db4c55dd4a03a87c2ad9cac74695": {
          "id": "d472db4c55dd4a03a87c2ad9cac74695",
          "name": "All Attestations ",
          "script": "(function execute() {\n    \n    var list = [];\n    var gr = new GlideRecord(\"asmt_assessment_instance\");\n    //gr.addQuery(\"active\", \"true\");\n    gr.addEncodedQuery('stateNOT INcomplete,canceled^metric_type.evaluation_method=attestation_v2^userDYNAMIC90d1921e5f510100a9ad2572f2b477fe');\n    gr.orderByDesc(\"sys_updated_on\");\n    gr.query();\n    while (gr.hasNext()) {\n        gr.next();\n        list.push(gr.getUniqueValue());\n    }\n    gs.log(list);\n    vaVars.attestation_list = JSON.stringify(list);\n    gs.log(\"first action expression\")\n})()\n",
          "stepType": "ScriptAction",
          "applicability": {

            "mode": "glide_scripted_query",
            "value": "(function execute(table) {\n    \n    var options = [];\n    var grAtt = new GlideRecord(\"asmt_assessment_instance\");\n    grAtt.addEncodedQuery(\"stateNOT INcomplete,canceled^metric_type.evaluation_method=attestation_v2^metric_type=12c75d12df101200dca6a5f59bf26394^userDYNAMIC90d1921e5f510100a9ad2572f2b477fe\");\n    grAtt.setLimit(15);\n    grAtt.query();\n    while(grAtt.next()) {\n        options.push({ \n            'value': grAtt.getUniqueValue(), \n            'label': grAtt.getDisplayValue('sn_grc_profile') + \": \" + grAtt.getValue('number') + \" - \" + grAtt.getDisplayValue('state') + \" - \" + grAtt.getDisplayValue('due_date')\n        });\n        gs.log(\"glideeeee\"+grAtt.getValue('number'));\n    }\n    \n    vaVars.index = options;\n    gs.log(\"INDEXXXXXXXXX\" + vaVars.index);\n    return options;\n})(table)\n"

            "value": "(function execute(table) {\n    \n    var options = [];\n    var grAtt = new GlideRecord(\"asmt_assessment_instance\");\n    grAtt.addEncodedQuery(\"userDYNAMIC90d1921e5f510100a9ad2572f2b477fe^metric_type=12c75d12df101200dca6a5f59bf26394^due_dateONToday@javascript:gs.beginningOfToday()@javascript:gs.endOfToday()\");\n    grAtt.setLimit(15);\n    grAtt.query();\n    while(grAtt.next()) {\n         options.push({ \n            'value': grAtt.getUniqueValue(), \n            'label': grAtt.getDisplayValue('sn_grc_profile') + \": \" + grAtt.getValue('number') + \" - \" + grAtt.getDisplayValue('state') + \" - Due By: \" + grAtt.getDisplayValue('due_date')\n        });\n        gs.log(\"glideeeee\"+grAtt.getValue('number'));\n    }\n    \n    vaVars.index = options;\n    gs.log(\"INDEXXXXXXXXX\" + vaVars.index);\n    return options;\n})(table)\n"
          }
        },

        "66f72d4af3724ccb99408f0fd2617f70": {
          "id": "66f72d4af3724ccb99408f0fd2617f70",
          "name": "test script ",
          "script": "(function execute() {\n    /* Code your scripted action here. For example, you might update a \n       record based on conditional logic:\n    \n        if (vaVars.my_flag == 'say hello') {\n            gs.info('hi there');\n        } else {\n            gs.info('bye now');\n        }\n    */\n    gs.log(\"INDEXXXXXX 2\" + vaVars.index);\n    gs.log(\"INPUTSSSSS \" + vaVars.attid);\n    // var grPick = new GlideRecord(\"asmt_assessment_instance\");\n    // grPick.addQuery(pick_from_attestation_all);\n    // grPick.query();\n    // if(grPick.next()) {\n    //     gs.log(\"WADU HEKKKKKK\");\n    // }\n    var grCard = new GlideRecord('asmt_assessment_instance');\n    grCard.get(vaVars.attid);\n    vaVars.attNumber = grCard.number;\n    gs.log(\"REEEEE\" + vaVars.attNumber);\n    return grCard;\n})()\n",
          "stepType": "ScriptAction",
          "applicability": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "query"
          }
        },
        "be1ce8363788450eb0de6b1370e31b28": {
          "id": "be1ce8363788450eb0de6b1370e31b28",
          "stepType": "LinkOutput",
          "name": "link",
          "url": {
            "value": "(function execute() {\n    /* Return a quoted string.  For example:\n\n       var result;\n       if (vaInputs.first_name == 'Bill') {\n           return gs.getMessage('hi there {0}', [vaInputs.first_name]);\n       } else {\n           return gs.getMessage('how are you {0}', [vaInputs.last_name]);\n       }\n    */\n\n    //return gs.getMessage('https://clauzelmadrid.service-now.com/nav_to.do?uri=%2Fasmt_assessment_instance_list.do%3Fsysparm_query%3DuserDYNAMIC90d1921e5f510100a9ad2572f2b477fe%255EstateNOT%2520INcomplete%252Ccanceled%255Emetric_type.evaluation_method%253Dattestation_v2%255Emetric_type%253D12c75d12df101200dca6a5f59bf26394%255Esys_id%253D' + vaVars.attid + '%26sysparm_first_row%3D1%26sysparm_view%3DGRC_Attestation');\n    return gs.getMessage(gs.getProperty('glide.servlet.uri') + 'nav_to.do?uri=%2Fasmt_assessment_instance.do%3Fsys_id%3D0c8e15c5137473407467721a6144b055%26sysparm_view%3DGRC_Attestation%26sysparm_record_target%3Dasmt_assessment_instance%26sysparm_record_row%3D1%26sysparm_record_rows%3D1%26sysparm_record_list%3DuserDYNAMICjavascript%253Ags.getUserID%2528%2529%255EstateNOT%2BINcomplete%252Ccanceled%255Emetric_type.evaluation_method%253Dattestation_v2%255Emetric_type%253D12c75d12df101200dca6a5f59bf26394%255Esys_id%253D' + vaVars.attid + '%255EORDERBYDESCsys_created_on');\n})()\n",
            "mode": "script"
          },
          "label": {
            "value": "(function execute() {\n    /* Return a quoted string.  For example:\n\n       var result;\n       if (vaInputs.first_name == 'Bill') {\n           return gs.getMessage('hi there {0}', [vaInputs.first_name]);\n       } else {\n           return gs.getMessage('how are you {0}', [vaInputs.last_name]);\n       }\n    */\n    gs.log(\"Numberrrr\"+vaVars.attNumber)\n    return gs.getMessage(vaVars.attNumber);\n})()\n",
            "mode": "script"
          },
          "header": {
            "value": "(function execute() {\n    /* Return a quoted string.  For example:\n\n       var result;\n       if (vaInputs.first_name == 'Bill') {\n           return gs.getMessage('hi there {0}', [vaInputs.first_name]);\n       } else {\n           return gs.getMessage('how are you {0}', [vaInputs.last_name]);\n       }\n    */\n    return gs.getMessage('Link to view ' + [vaVars.attNumber] );\n})()\n",
            "mode": "script"
          },

"}],"id":"1a662abbb760440f846b7d26b8f91c59","goal_id":"c950d41cc8ce4f02b5e86b34d2aae3b6"},{"type":"ScriptedAction","script":"(function execute() {

 var list = [];
 var gr = new GlideRecord("asmt_assessment_instance");
 gr.addEncodedQuery('stateNOT INcomplete,canceled^metric_type.evaluation_method=attestation_v2^userDYNAMIC90d1921e5f510100a9ad2572f2b477fe^due_date<javascript:gs.beginningOfNextWeek()');
 //due_dateONNext week@javascript:gs.beginningOfNextWeek()@javascript:gs.endOfNextWeek()
 gr.orderByDesc("sys_updated_on");
 gr.query();
 while (gr.hasNext()) {
 gr.next();
 list.push(gr.getUniqueValue());
 }
 vaVars.attestation_list = JSON.stringify(list);

})()

","id":"229011c0f44a4ee2935e7736111deaf3","name":"Due Today","goal_id":"c950d41cc8ce4f02b5e86b34d2aae3b6"},{"type":"ScriptedAction","script":"(function execute() {

 var options = [];
 var grAtt = new GlideRecord("asmt_assessment_instance");
 grAtt.addEncodedQuery("stateNOT INcomplete,canceled^metric_type.evaluation_method=attestation_v2^metric_type=12c75d12df101200dca6a5f59bf26394^userDYNAMIC90d1921e5f510100a9ad2572f2b477fe");
 grAtt.setLimit(15);
 grAtt.query();
 while(grAtt.next()) {
 options.push({ 
 'value': grAtt.getUniqueValue(), 
 'label': grAtt.getDisplayValue('sn_grc_profile') + ": " + grAtt.getValue('number') + " - " + grAtt.getDisplayValue('state') + " - " + grAtt.getDisplayValue('due_date')
 });
 gs.log("glideeeee"+grAtt.getValue('number'));
 }
 
 vaVars.index = options;
 gs.log("INDEXXXXXXXXX" + vaVars.index);
 return options;
})(table)

"}},{"type":"Decision","name":"Decision","branches":[{"type":"Branch","label":"Not empty","expression":{"type":"Applicability","mode":"script","value":"(function execute() {
 /* Return true or false to indicate the branch condition's applicability.
 For example:

 var applies = vaInputs.first_name == 'Bill' ? true : false;
 return applies;
 */
 var gr = new GlideRecord("asmt_assessment_instance");
 if (gr.get(vaInputs.pick_from_attestation_all.getValue())) {
 vaVars.attid = vaInputs.pick_from_attestation_all.getValue();
 gs.log("trueeeeee" + vaInputs.pick_from_attestation_all);
 return true;
 }
 gs.log('falseeeeee');

        "07edc34093e046e298142e3609236995": {
          "id": "07edc34093e046e298142e3609236995",
          "name": "Due This Week",
          "script": "(function execute() {\n\n    var list = [];\n    var gr = new GlideRecord(\"asmt_assessment_instance\");\n    gr.addEncodedQuery('stateNOT INcomplete,canceled^metric_type.evaluation_method=attestation_v2^userDYNAMIC90d1921e5f510100a9ad2572f2b477fe^due_date<javascript:gs.beginningOfNextWeek()');\n    //due_dateONNext week@javascript:gs.beginningOfNextWeek()@javascript:gs.endOfNextWeek()\n    gr.orderByDesc(\"sys_updated_on\");\n    gr.query();\n    while (gr.hasNext()) {\n        gr.next();\n        list.push(gr.getUniqueValue());\n    }\n    vaVars.attestation_list = JSON.stringify(list);\n\n})()\n",
          "stepType": "ScriptAction",
          "applicability": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "query"
          }
        },
        "229011c0f44a4ee2935e7736111deaf3": {
          "id": "229011c0f44a4ee2935e7736111deaf3",
          "name": "Due Today",
          "script": "(function execute() {\n\n    var list = [];\n    var gr = new GlideRecord(\"asmt_assessment_instance\");\n    gr.addEncodedQuery('stateNOT INcomplete,canceled^metric_type.evaluation_method=attestation_v2^userDYNAMIC90d1921e5f510100a9ad2572f2b477fe^due_date<javascript:gs.beginningOfTomorrow()');\n    gr.orderByDesc(\"sys_updated_on\");\n    gr.query();\n    while (gr.hasNext()) {\n        gr.next();\n        list.push(gr.getUniqueValue());\n    }\n    vaVars.attestation_list = JSON.stringify(list);\n\n})()\n\n",
          "stepType": "ScriptAction",
          "applicability": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "query"
          }
        },
        "839f141e95ec4219aecfa1f0c0078ccd": {
          "id": "839f141e95ec4219aecfa1f0c0078ccd",
          "name": "All Attestations ",
          "script": "(function execute() {\n    \n    var list = [];\n    var gr = new GlideRecord(\"asmt_assessment_instance\");\n    //gr.addQuery(\"active\", \"true\");\n    gr.addEncodedQuery('stateNOT INcomplete,canceled^metric_type.evaluation_method=attestation_v2^userDYNAMIC90d1921e5f510100a9ad2572f2b477fe');\n    gr.orderByDesc(\"sys_updated_on\");\n    gr.query();\n    while (gr.hasNext()) {\n        gr.next();\n        list.push(gr.getUniqueValue());\n    }\n    gs.log(list);\n    vaVars.attestation_list = JSON.stringify(list);\n    gs.log(\"first action expression\")\n})()\n",
          "stepType": "ScriptAction",
          "applicability": {

          "condition": {
            "mode": "glide_scripted_query",
            "value": "(function execute(table) {\n    \n    var options = [];\n    var grAtt = new GlideRecord(\"asmt_assessment_instance\");\n    grAtt.addEncodedQuery(\"stateNOT INcomplete,canceled^metric_type.evaluation_method=attestation_v2^metric_type=12c75d12df101200dca6a5f59bf26394^userDYNAMIC90d1921e5f510100a9ad2572f2b477fe\");\n    grAtt.setLimit(15);\n    grAtt.query();\n    while(grAtt.next()) {\n        options.push({ \n            'value': grAtt.getUniqueValue(), \n            'label': grAtt.getDisplayValue('sn_grc_profile') + \": \" + grAtt.getValue('number') + \" - \" + grAtt.getDisplayValue('state') + \" - \" + grAtt.getDisplayValue('due_date')\n        });\n        gs.log(\"glideeeee\"+grAtt.getValue('number'));\n    }\n    \n    vaVars.index = options;\n    gs.log(\"INDEXXXXXXXXX\" + vaVars.index);\n    return options;\n})(table)\n"

          "optional": false,

          },
          "variableId": "9fd661b7bc4d4945ae3ac260d463a7be",
          "id": "583f150c85b2446ab59f3f4e19c7e8fb",
          "mode": "glide_record",
          "script": "",
          "noRecordsResponseMsg": {
            "value": "No Records Found",
            "mode": "simple"
          },
          "condition": {
            "mode": "glide_scripted_query",
            "value": "(function execute(table) {\n    \n    var options = [];\n    var grAtt = new GlideRecord(\"asmt_assessment_instance\");\n    grAtt.addEncodedQuery(\"userDYNAMIC90d1921e5f510100a9ad2572f2b477fe^metric_type=12c75d12df101200dca6a5f59bf26394^due_dateONThis week@javascript:gs.beginningOfThisWeek()@javascript:gs.endOfThisWeek()\");\n    grAtt.setLimit(15);\n    grAtt.query();\n    while(grAtt.next()) {\n         options.push({ \n            'value': grAtt.getUniqueValue(), \n            'label': grAtt.getDisplayValue('sn_grc_profile') + \": \" + grAtt.getValue('number') + \" - \" + grAtt.getDisplayValue('state') + \" - Due By: \" + grAtt.getDisplayValue('due_date')\n        });\n        gs.log(\"glideeeee\"+grAtt.getValue('number'));\n    }\n    \n    vaVars.index = options;\n    gs.log(\"INDEXXXXXXXXX\" + vaVars.index);\n    return options;\n})(table)\n"
          }
        },

        "ba021887d1bc499cb8c8c5640704c733": {
          "id": "ba021887d1bc499cb8c8c5640704c733",
          "name": "test script ",
          "script": "(function execute() {\n    /* Code your scripted action here. For example, you might update a \n       record based on conditional logic:\n    \n        if (vaVars.my_flag == 'say hello') {\n            gs.info('hi there');\n        } else {\n            gs.info('bye now');\n        }\n    */\n    gs.log(\"INDEXXXXXX 2\" + vaVars.index);\n    gs.log(\"INPUTSSSSS \" + vaVars.attid);\n    // var grPick = new GlideRecord(\"asmt_assessment_instance\");\n    // grPick.addQuery(pick_from_attestation_all);\n    // grPick.query();\n    // if(grPick.next()) {\n    //     gs.log(\"WADU HEKKKKKK\");\n    // }\n    var grCard = new GlideRecord('asmt_assessment_instance');\n    grCard.get(vaVars.attid);\n    vaVars.attNumber = grCard.number;\n    gs.log(\"REEEEE\" + vaVars.attNumber);\n    return grCard;\n})()\n",
          "stepType": "ScriptAction",
          "applicability": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "query"
          }
        },
        "8c467a7409b745158c90f7c066e9c87c": {
          "id": "8c467a7409b745158c90f7c066e9c87c",
          "stepType": "LinkOutput",
          "name": "link",
          "url": {
            "value": "(function execute() {\n    /* Return a quoted string.  For example:\n\n       var result;\n       if (vaInputs.first_name == 'Bill') {\n           return gs.getMessage('hi there {0}', [vaInputs.first_name]);\n       } else {\n           return gs.getMessage('how are you {0}', [vaInputs.last_name]);\n       }\n    */\n\n    //return gs.getMessage('https://clauzelmadrid.service-now.com/nav_to.do?uri=%2Fasmt_assessment_instance_list.do%3Fsysparm_query%3DuserDYNAMIC90d1921e5f510100a9ad2572f2b477fe%255EstateNOT%2520INcomplete%252Ccanceled%255Emetric_type.evaluation_method%253Dattestation_v2%255Emetric_type%253D12c75d12df101200dca6a5f59bf26394%255Esys_id%253D' + vaVars.attid + '%26sysparm_first_row%3D1%26sysparm_view%3DGRC_Attestation');\n    return gs.getMessage(gs.getProperty('glide.servlet.uri') + 'nav_to.do?uri=%2Fasmt_assessment_instance.do%3Fsys_id%3D0c8e15c5137473407467721a6144b055%26sysparm_view%3DGRC_Attestation%26sysparm_record_target%3Dasmt_assessment_instance%26sysparm_record_row%3D1%26sysparm_record_rows%3D1%26sysparm_record_list%3DuserDYNAMICjavascript%253Ags.getUserID%2528%2529%255EstateNOT%2BINcomplete%252Ccanceled%255Emetric_type.evaluation_method%253Dattestation_v2%255Emetric_type%253D12c75d12df101200dca6a5f59bf26394%255Esys_id%253D' + vaVars.attid + '%255EORDERBYDESCsys_created_on');\n})()\n",
            "mode": "script"
          },
          "label": {
            "value": "(function execute() {\n    /* Return a quoted string.  For example:\n\n       var result;\n       if (vaInputs.first_name == 'Bill') {\n           return gs.getMessage('hi there {0}', [vaInputs.first_name]);\n       } else {\n           return gs.getMessage('how are you {0}', [vaInputs.last_name]);\n       }\n    */\n    gs.log(\"Numberrrr\"+vaVars.attNumber)\n    return gs.getMessage(vaVars.attNumber);\n})()\n",
            "mode": "script"
          },
          "header": {
            "value": "(function execute() {\n    /* Return a quoted string.           "id": "91d7119b84c64f3899b385aef3c9c62d",
          "name": "Due This Week",
          "script": "(function execute() {\n\n    var list = [];\n    var gr = new GlideRecord(\"asmt_assessment_instance\");\n    gr.addEncodedQuery('stateNOT INcomplete,canceled^metric_type.evaluation_method=attestation_v2^userDYNAMIC90d1921e5f510100a9ad2572f2b477fe^due_date<javascript:gs.beginningOfNextWeek()');\n    //due_dateONNext week@javascript:gs.beginningOfNextWeek()@javascript:gs.endOfNextWeek()\n    gr.orderByDesc(\"sys_updated_on\");\n    gr.query();\n    while (gr.hasNext()) {\n        gr.next();\n        list.push(gr.getUniqueValue());\n    }\n    vaVars.attestation_list = JSON.stringify(list);\n\n})()\n",
          "stepType": "ScriptAction",
          "applicability": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "query"
          }
        },
        "540f800db67644c493a4a80244ed7088": {
          "id": "540f800db67644c493a4a80244ed7088",
          "name": "Due Today",
          "script": "(function execute() {\n\n    var list = [];\n    var gr = new GlideRecord(\"asmt_assessment_instance\");\n    gr.addEncodedQuery('stateNOT INcomplete,canceled^metric_type.evaluation_method=attestation_v2^userDYNAMIC90d1921e5f510100a9ad2572f2b477fe^due_date<javascript:gs.beginningOfTomorrow()');\n    gr.orderByDesc(\"sys_updated_on\");\n    gr.query();\n    while (gr.hasNext()) {\n        gr.next();\n        list.push(gr.getUniqueValue());\n    }\n    vaVars.attestation_list = JSON.stringify(list);\n\n})()\n\n",
          "stepType": "ScriptAction",
          "applicability": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "query"
          }
        },
        "9bdf6e6a6b3a4bb6b5b4e073b19b02d5": {
          "id": "9bdf6e6a6b3a4bb6b5b4e073b19b02d5",
          "name": "All Attestations ",
          "script": "(function execute() {\n    \n    var list = [];\n    var gr = new GlideRecord(\"asmt_assessment_instance\");\n    //gr.addQuery(\"active\", \"true\");\n    gr.addEncodedQuery('stateNOT INcomplete,canceled^metric_type.evaluation_method=attestation_v2^userDYNAMIC90d1921e5f510100a9ad2572f2b477fe');\n    gr.orderByDesc(\"sys_updated_on\");\n    gr.query();\n    while (gr.hasNext()) {\n        gr.next();\n        list.push(gr.getUniqueValue());\n    }\n    gs.log(list);\n    vaVars.attestation_list = JSON.stringify(list);\n    gs.log(\"first action expression\")\n})()\n",
          "stepType": "ScriptAction",
          "applicability": {

            "mode": "glide_scripted_query",
            "value": "(function execute(table) {\n    \n    var options = [];\n    var grAtt = new GlideRecord(\"asmt_assessment_instance\");\n    grAtt.addEncodedQuery(\"stateNOT INcomplete,canceled^metric_type.evaluation_method=attestation_v2^metric_type=12c75d12df101200dca6a5f59bf26394^userDYNAMIC90d1921e5f510100a9ad2572f2b477fe\");\n    grAtt.setLimit(15);\n    grAtt.query();\n    while(grAtt.next()) {\n        options.push({ \n            'value': grAtt.getUniqueValue(), \n            'label': grAtt.getDisplayValue('sn_grc_profile') + \": \" + grAtt.getValue('number') + \" - \" + grAtt.getDisplayValue('state') + \" - \" + grAtt.getDisplayValue('due_date')\n        });\n        gs.log(\"glideeeee\"+grAtt.getValue('number'));\n    }\n    \n    vaVars.index = options;\n    gs.log(\"INDEXXXXXXXXX\" + vaVars.index);\n    return options;\n})(table)\n"

          },
          "condition": {
            "mode": "glide_scripted_query",
            "value": "(function execute(table) {\n    \n    var options = [];\n    var grAtt = new GlideRecord(\"asmt_assessment_instance\");\n    grAtt.addEncodedQuery(\"userDYNAMIC90d1921e5f510100a9ad2572f2b477fe^metric_type=12c75d12df101200dca6a5f59bf26394^due_dateONThis week@javascript:gs.beginningOfThisWeek()@javascript:gs.endOfThisWeek()\");\n    grAtt.setLimit(15);\n    grAtt.query();\n    while(grAtt.next()) {\n         options.push({ \n            'value': grAtt.getUniqueValue(), \n            'label': grAtt.getDisplayValue('sn_grc_profile') + \": \" + grAtt.getValue('number') + \" - \" + grAtt.getDisplayValue('state') + \" - Due By: \" + grAtt.getDisplayValue('due_date')\n        });\n        gs.log(\"glideeeee\"+grAtt.getValue('number'));\n    }\n    \n    vaVars.index = options;\n    gs.log(\"INDEXXXXXXXXX\" + vaVars.index);\n    return options;\n})(table)\n"
          }
        },

        "a4773681cc654987b9832ee59b4acf09": {
          "id": "a4773681cc654987b9832ee59b4acf09",
          "name": "test script ",
          "script": "(function execute() {\n    /* Code your scripted action here. For example, you might update a \n       record based on conditional logic:\n    \n        if (vaVars.my_flag == 'say hello') {\n            gs.info('hi there');\n        } else {\n            gs.info('bye now');\n        }\n    */\n    gs.log(\"INDEXXXXXX 2\" + vaVars.index);\n    gs.log(\"INPUTSSSSS \" + vaVars.attid);\n    // var grPick = new GlideRecord(\"asmt_assessment_instance\");\n    // grPick.addQuery(pick_from_attestation_all);\n    // grPick.query();\n    // if(grPick.next()) {\n    //     gs.log(\"WADU HEKKKKKK\");\n    // }\n    var grCard = new GlideRecord('asmt_assessment_instance');\n    grCard.get(vaVars.attid);\n    vaVars.attNumber = grCard.number;\n    gs.log(\"REEEEE\" + vaVars.attNumber);\n    return grCard;\n})()\n",
          "stepType": "ScriptAction",
          "applicability": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "query"
          }
        },
        "4c60f6b9557d4dbaafa1d81844ea1cbb": {
          "id": "4c60f6b9557d4dbaafa1d81844ea1cbb",
          "stepType": "LinkOutput",
          "name": "link",
          "url": {
            "value": "(function execute() {\n    /* Return a quoted string.  For example:\n\n       var result;\n       if (vaInputs.first_name == 'Bill') {\n           return gs.getMessage('hi there {0}', [vaInputs.first_name]);\n       } else {\n           return gs.getMessage('how are you {0}', [vaInputs.last_name]);\n       }\n    */\n\n    //return gs.getMessage('https://clauzelmadrid.service-now.com/nav_to.do?uri=%2Fasmt_assessment_instance_list.do%3Fsysparm_query%3DuserDYNAMIC90d1921e5f510100a9ad2572f2b477fe%255EstateNOT%2520INcomplete%252Ccanceled%255Emetric_type.evaluation_method%253Dattestation_v2%255Emetric_type%253D12c75d12df101200dca6a5f59bf26394%255Esys_id%253D' + vaVars.attid + '%26sysparm_first_row%3D1%26sysparm_view%3DGRC_Attestation');\n    return gs.getMessage('https://clauzelmadrid.service-now.com/nav_to.do?uri=%2Fasmt_assessment_instance.do%3Fsys_id%3D0c8e15c5137473407467721a6144b055%26sysparm_view%3DGRC_Attestation%26sysparm_record_target%3Dasmt_assessment_instance%26sysparm_record_row%3D1%26sysparm_record_rows%3D1%26sysparm_record_list%3DuserDYNAMICjavascript%253Ags.getUserID%2528%2529%255EstateNOT%2BINcomplete%252Ccanceled%255Emetric_type.evaluation_method%253Dattestation_v2%255Emetric_type%253D12c75d12df101200dca6a5f59bf26394%255Esys_id%253D' + vaVars.attid + '%255EORDERBYDESCsys_created_on');\n})()\n",
            "mode": "script"
          },
          "label": {
            "value": "(function execute() {\n    /* Return a quoted string.  For example:\n\n       var result;\n       if (vaInputs.first_name == 'Bill') {\n           return gs.getMessage('hi there {0}', [vaInputs.first_name]);\n       } else {\n           return gs.getMessage('how are you {0}', [vaInputs.last_name]);\n       }\n    */\n    gs.log(\"Numberrrr\"+vaVars.attNumber)\n    return gs.getMessage(vaVars.attNumber);\n})()\n",
            "mode": "script"
          },
          "header": {
            "value": "(function execute() {\n    /* Return a quoted string.
